Submodules

app.app module

app.config module

Application configuration module.

This module provides configuration classes and utilities for managing environment-specific settings for the Flask application.

class app.config.Config[source]

Bases: object

Base configuration class.

DATABASE_URL

The database connection URL.

Type:

str

SECRET_KEY

The secret key for security purposes.

Type:

str

TOKEN_EXPIRATION_MINUTES

Expiration time for authentication tokens in minutes.

Type:

int

DEBUG

Debug mode toggle.

Type:

bool

DATABASE_URL = 'sqlite:///ecommerce.db'
DEBUG = True
SECRET_KEY = 'your_default_secret_key'
TOKEN_EXPIRATION_MINUTES = 60
class app.config.DevelopmentConfig[source]

Bases: Config

Configuration for the development environment.

Inherits:

Config: The base configuration class.

ENV

Set to “development”.

Type:

str

DEBUG

Always True for development.

Type:

bool

DEBUG = True
ENV = 'development'
class app.config.ProductionConfig[source]

Bases: Config

Configuration for the production environment.

Inherits:

Config: The base configuration class.

ENV

Set to “production”.

Type:

str

DEBUG

Always False for production.

Type:

bool

DEBUG = False
ENV = 'production'
app.config.get_config(env=None)[source]

Retrieve the appropriate configuration class based on the environment.

Parameters:

env (str, optional) – The environment name (“development” or “production”). Defaults to the FLASK_ENV environment variable or “development”.

Returns:

The corresponding configuration class.

Return type:

class
